page.title: 16The Rector's Day, Woolstone
page.content: The Rector starts work in the morning at 8.00a.m.and walks up to Woolstone Church to say Morning Matins, usually by himself.He tries to spend the morning in preparation.In the afternoon he goes round visiting or goes meetings,there are evening meetings as well.One day is never the same as another.Sundays are always full.The Rector likes his job and is very happy.He hasn't always been a Rector,he used to be a solicitor's clerk,although he has always had alot to do with the Church. His favourite service is Compline.He goes to 7 services aweek not including Weddings, Funerals or Christenings.The Rector sometimes goes to Tewkesbury Abbey and Gloucester Cathedral.His favourite people are Mother Tereasa and Leonard Cheshire. .
